summary: AN ORDINANCE concerning the Elevated Transportation Company; transferring and reappropriating funds from the 2001 budget for Finance General to the Initiative 53 Planning Fund; directing the transfer of such funds to a bank account of the ETC acceptable to the Mayor; authorizing and directing the Director of Finance to develop a program of reports and other information to be submitted to the City by the Elevated Transportation Company; authorizing the Director of Finance to enter into agreements with the Elevated Transportation Company; and ratifying and confirming certain prior acts; all by a three-fourths vote of all the members of the City Council.
